Character Submissions:



Name: Dark One
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Dilophasaurus (Spitter)
Side: N/A Freelance (Mercenary)

Description:

Character History:

Created on July 4th, 2276 AD, the 500th anniversary of the Earth nation the 
United States of America.  Made in a lab owned by a Predacon company called 
Shuko International.  He, and four others, were created for the Predacon war 
about to come.  Rebelling, Dark One and his men escaped the lab, stealing 
technology and blowing up the building.  Stealing a Shuko craft, he and his 
men were chased through time itself for a while, the enemy Shuko ship 
shooting them down over Past Earth, satisfied they left.  Now Dark One is the 
leader of a mercenary cell called the Oblitercons, a gestalt team that forms 
into Oblitertron, Dark One forming Oblitertron's head and torso.

Character Personality: 

Dark One will not hesitate to kill, though is not trigger happy.  With great 
leadership qualities, when fighting along side his men, he is almost 
'invincible'.  Hates Maximals, though he has never personally met one.  It is 
just something programmed into his neuro-circuitry by the Shuko scientists.  
Will remain loyal to the end to anyone who pays the fee for his talented 
services.

Character Stats:

Function: Oblitercon Leader

Strength: 8.0
Intelligence: 6.5
Speed: 5.0
Endurance: 8.5
Rank: 1.0
Firepower: 8.0
Skill: 10+

Beast Mode Description:

At seven feet high in his Dilphasaurus mode, this reptile's scales form a 
strong shield that protects him from ice, fire, and laser weaponry.  His 
claws and teeth are razor sharp and can be deadly.  A 'mane' (only of scales 
and such) flips up from the sides of its heads, which Dark One can then fire 
a sonic blast, or extremely deadly acid from his mouth.

Robot Mode Description:

Standing at eight feet high, Dark One is a strange sight.  His entire body is 
black, with no markings or insignias, declairing his somewhat neutriality in 
the Beast Wars (though when the time comes, he will take on the symbol of 
those who pay him for his services).  Heavily armored all over.  Two crimson 
optics are the only light coming rom him.  It is rather hard to notice his 
smooth looking black armor is really millions of scales.  In his right hand 
he carries a plasma rifle.  In subspace he possess charges, an energon sword, 
two laser pistols, and a sub-machine gun that fires explosive shells.


Name: Breakdown
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Termite
Side: N/A Freelance (Mercenary)

Description:

Character History:

Brought online on the Earth date of July 4th, 2274,  the 500th anniversary of 
the Earth nation the United States of America's creation.  Made in a lab 
owned by a Predacon company called Shuko International.  He, and four others, 
were created for the Predacon war about to come.  Rebelling with the others 
with him, lead by a Predacon called Dark One, he and his comrades escaped, 
killing the scientists, taking technology, and destroying the lab.  Stealing 
a Shuko craft, they were chased by a large Shuko ship through time itself for 
a while, until they were shot down and crash landed on Past Earth, the Shuko 
ship leaving satisfied.  Now Breakdown is a member of the mercenary gestalt 
team called the Oblitercons, who form into Oblitertron, which he forms the 
gestalt's left arm.

Character Personality:

Breakdown follows orders, and hates Maximals bitterly, as he was programmed 
to do.  He will never question Dark One's orders.  Having a vast knowledge in 
explosives, Breakdown can create a bomb with the simplest of components and 
tools, which also causes him to want to see things blow up.  

Character Stats:

Function: Oblitercon Team Member

Strength: 6.0
Intellignece: 5.8
Speed: 5.0
Endurance: 6.5
Rank: 2.0
Firepower: 7.0
Skill: 10+

Beast Mode Description:

When in his beast mode, he is not a small insignificant bug.  He is a ten 
foot high termite with a wanting for mass destruction.  Can smash down a 
forest in a few seconds.  His mandibles of death can take down most.  The 
large shell covering his body is a super-strong shield.

Robot Mode Description:

His mandibles can be seen on his face, as well as a pair of green buggish 
eyes.  His color is a light brown, and he looks like he's on steroids as he 
stands at nine feet tall.  At the end of the fingers on his hands, he has 
sharp points that are like razors.  In on of the deadly hands he carries a 
sonic blaster.  In subspace he possesses a dozen charges, bomb making 
equipment, a grenade launcher, a plasma pistol, and a heavy laser rifle.


Name: Pyro
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Black Dragon
Side: N/A Freelance (Mercenary)

Description:

Character History:

Entered existance on the Earth date of July 4th, 2274,  the 500th anniversary 
of the Earth nation the United States of America's creation.  Made in a lab 
owned by a Predacon company called Shuko International.  He, and four others, 
were created for the Predacon war about to come.  Rebelling with the others 
with him, lead by a Predacon called Dark One, Pyro and his comrades escaped, 
killing the scientists, taking technology, and destroying the lab.  Stealing 
a Shuko craft, they were chased by a large Shuko ship through time itself for 
a while, until they were shot down and crash landed on Past Earth, the Shuko 
ship leaving satisfied.  Now Pyro is part of the mercenary gestalt team 
called the Oblitercons, who form into Oblitertron, which he forms the 
gestalt's right arm.

Character Personality:

Pyro is a regular pyromaniac.  His arsonist hobbies cause him to have an 
obsession with burning objects.  He has a vast knowledge on the history of 
the Universe, all the knowledge that could be gathered by the Predacons, 
Maximals, Humans, Nebulans, etc that the Cybertronian species knew.  Follows 
orders enthusiastically, he is happy with his pitiful role in life.

Character Stats:

Function: Oblitercon Team Member

Strength: 7.0
Intelligence: 6.0
Speed: 6.4 (In beast mode it is 8.0)
Endurance: 7.0
Rank: 3.0
Firepower: 6.5
Skill: 10+

Beast Mode Description:

In beast mode he is a gargantuous dragon, who's scales are purely black, the 
only thing not black is his fire-colored eyes, and the deadly flames spewing 
from his nostrils.  His tail can be used like a club, and his wings lift his 
fifteen foot high body off into the air, the rockets on the back of them, and 
in his feet, send him speedng at Mach 6.

Robot Mode Description:

A red visor across his purely black.  On the tips of his fingers are deadly 
claws.  Not a single isignia rests on his body (though that changes when they 
get a new employeer, if the employeer wishes).  In one clawed hand is a 
flamethrower, in the other is a flame cannon, that fires powerful burts of 
fire in circular shapes that 'explode' on impact, or just fire a continuous 
flame of fire.  In subspace there is a laser rifle, a box of Earth-style 
matches, a canister of oil, and an energon knife.


Name: Hiss
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Rattlesnake
Side: N/A Freelance (Mercenary)

Description:

Character History:

Viewed his first sight on the Earth date of July 4th, 2274,  the 500th 
anniversary of the Earth nation the United States of America's creation.  
Made in a lab owned by a Predacon company called Shuko International.  He, 
and four others, were created for the Predacon war about to come.  Rebelling 
with the others with him, lead by a Predacon called Dark One, Hiss and his 
team mates escaped, killing the scientists, taking some technology, and 
destroying the lab.  Stealing a Shuko craft, they were chased by a large 
Shuko ship through time itself for a while, until they were shot down and 
crash landed on Past Earth, the Shuko ship leaving satisfied.  Hiss is now a 
mercinary in the mercenary team called the Oblitercons, who form into 
Oblitertron, which he forms the gestalt's left leg.

Character Personality:

A built in hatred for Maximals, along with a built in tendenancy to always 
follow orders.  Hiss is a genius.  Programmed with a vast knowledge of 
everything, he is the scientist of the group.  Finds, brute force rather 
primitive, and declares that science is the way of the future, but he doesn't 
bother to many people about the subject.

Character Description:

Function: Oblitercon Team Member

Strength: 5.8
Intelligence: 9.5
Speed: 6.7
Endurance: 6.0
Rank: 4.0
Firepower: 6.3
Skill: 10+

Beast Mode Description:

A little large compared to a regular Western Washington rattlesnake, Hiss is 
twenty feet long and four feet wide in his beast mode.  His fangs inject 
enemies with a nerve toxin that destroys their neurological circuitry, not to 
mention they hurt.  He can wrap himself around a victim and can squeeze them 
until they can no longer function.

Robot Mode Description:

At six feet tall, he is the shortest of the group.  Hiss is a sandy brown, 
his fangs visible on his face and his optics a light grey.  His scales cover 
his brown body all over.  In his right hand he carries a fusion cannon, in 
his left an energy sword.  In subspace he has  variety of scientific 
equipment, a laser pistol, and a few charges.


Name: Scavenger
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Vulture
Side: N/A Freelance (Mercenary)

Description:

Character History:

Accessed his first memory on the Earth date of July 4th, 2274,  the 500th 
anniversary of the Earth nation the United States of America's creation.  
Activated in a lab owned by a Predacon company called Shuko International.  
He, and four others, were created for the Predacon war about to come.  
Rebelling with the others with him, lead by a Predacon called Dark One, 
Scavenger and his 'friends' escaped, killing the scientists, taking some 
technology, and destroying the lab.  Stealing a Shuko craft, they were chased 
by a large Shuko ship through time itself for a while, until they were shot 
down and crash landed on Past Earth, the Shuko ship leaving satisfied.  
Scavenger is now in a deadly mercenary team called the Oblitercons, who form 
into Oblitertron, which he forms the gestalt's left right leg.

Character Personality:

Hates all Maximals and Autobots, and hates Humans.  Follows orders to the 
letter.  Has a distninct ability to find scrap everywhere, and build it into 
useful tools.  Is the best mechanic among his team mates, he can fix most 
things with his optic sensors off.

Character Stats:

Function: Oblitercon Team Member

Strength: 7.0
Intelligence: 9.0
Speed: 5.9
Endurance: 7.3
Rank: 5.0
Firepower: 6.0
Skill: 10+

Beast Mode Description:

A huge vulture, his talons can slice through just about anything.  His beak 
can pierce through eight inches of steel.  His feathers can either clumb 
together and fire off as a missile, or fire off as razor sharp darts.

Robot Mode Description:

His optics join in the middle, making a yellow line as his optic.  Scavenger 
is a mix of black and white, his head a light tan.  His armor looks like its 
just a suit made of feathers, but the armor just looks like that to trick 
people into believing he is weak.  In his left hand he carries a chain gun 
with armor piercing rounds.  In subspace he carries a wide variety of tools, 
a laser pistol, and a rocket launcher.



-=-=======
(PS, Yanshosh, please delete Serpentor from character page, he is deceased)
